title: Healing Spirit Acupuncture - Columbia, MD
description: Specialties: Dina M. Singer, M.Ac., L.Ac. specializes in working with emotional issues such as depression, anxiety, stress and relaxation while also healing physical conditions such as headaches, back pain and shoulder pain(etc etc). She uses needles, moxabustion and cupping therapy to help assist the body in restoring balance. Healing Spirit Acupuncture now accepts CareFirst/BCBS, Aetna and United Healthcare insurance. Feel free to call to see if you're covered! Established in 2010. Healing Spirit Acupuncture was created in 2010 and has been working with people to live a more well balanced and pain free life.

Recommended Reviews [Learn more about reviews.](https://www.yelp.com/reviews-trust-link-tree?l=en_US) Overall rating 5 stars 4 stars 3 stars 2 stars 1 star - 2/22/2018 My experience with Dina at Healing Spirit Acupuncture has been nothing short of life-changing. She is a profound listener, which is evident in her individualized and acutely specific approach to treatment. Since coming to Dina for treatment a few years ago, the overall quality of my immune system and response to stress has improved 100 times over. Dina not only provides stellar treatment during my sessions, but sends me on my way with strategies I can employ each day that promote wellness and health in all aspects. I highly recommend her to anyone, whether they are interested in beginning an acupuncture treatment or have been using it for years - she is a fit for everyone. - 2/11/2018First to Review Dina is amazing! I have been a patient of hers for many years and have referred many people to her. She is caring and talented and invested in the well being of every person who enters her treatment room.
